title: White Screen
body: The game works fine but as soon as I get into the champion loading screen everything turns white. Please note that I am playing League on a Mac

replies.body: Hey there, I figured you were on a mac as soon as I saw the white screen.  ^^  This is a good thing, because there's a solid fix!  This white screen is usually caused by a connection problem struggling to keep you in sync and stay connected to our services.  You'll want to go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix it up, then test it in a custom game!
I have tried this and my connection is fine. This still happens.
